mapper.select: SELECT pa.pa_id, p.pro_name, p.pro_desc, p.word_name, p.pro_location, p.create_time, s.stu_name FROM project p, project_approval pa, student s, clazz c, discipline d, faculty f WHERE pa.pro_id = p.pro_id AND p.stu_id = s.stu_id AND s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id AND c.disc_id = d.disc_id AND d.fac_id = f.fac_id AND p.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pa.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND pa.tutor_id IS NULL AND f.fac_id = #{facId}
